TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MediaSyncEventType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of the member.
Docs.remarks:
Enumerates values returned by the following:
and taken as a parameter of the member.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MediaSyncEventType None = int32(0)

summary.para: No sync event specified. When used with a synchronized playback or capture method, the behavior is equivalent to calling the corresponding non synchronized method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MediaSyncEventType PresentationComplete = int32(1)

summary.para: The corresponding action is triggered only when the presentation is completed (meaning the media has been presented to the user) on the specified session. A synchronization of this type requires a source audio session ID to be set via {@link #setAudioSessionId(int) method.
